tasks.label: Run CLI smoke tests with templating
tasks.command: node dist/index.js compare fixtures/test.har fixtures/test2.har --out comparison.md && node dist/index.js gen insomnia fixtures/test.har --out test-collection.json && node dist/index.js gen tests fixtures/test.har --out generated-tests/ && node dist/index.js gen curl fixtures/test.har --out test-suite.sh --strict

tasks.label: Re-run compare after fix
tasks.command: node dist/index.js compare fixtures/test.har fixtures/test2.har --out comparison.md

tasks.label: Clean and regenerate artifacts
tasks.command: rm -f comparison.md && node dist/index.js compare fixtures/test.har fixtures/test2.har --out comparison.md && rm -rf generated-tests && node dist/index.js gen tests fixtures/test.har --out generated-tests/ && node dist/index.js gen insomnia fixtures/test.har --out test-collection.json
